casebody.data:
Frank BONGIORNO
v.
Joseph CAPONE Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 14, 2018

Mark F. Katz, in support of the petition.

Peter V. Lathouris, Stamford, in opposition.

*1135The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 185 Conn. App. 176, --- A.3d ---- (2018), is denied.

ROBINSON, C. J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
